channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's birthday added to list of free days at national parks; MLK Day, Juneteenth removed
item.description: The change to the schedule comes shortly after the Trump administration announced new fees for non-resident visitors.

item.title: Judge orders 2021 pipe bomb suspect to remain in jail pending future hearings

item.title: Temperatures hit record lows across the U.S.
item.description: Millions of Americans are dealing with record-low temperatures this weekend, and more than 12,000 residents in the Pacific Northwest are without power...

item.title: At least 11 killed in mass shooting at South African bar
item.description: A mass shooting at a bar near Pretoria, South Africa, has left at least 11 people dead, including three children

item.title: Trump wins peace prize at FIFA Men's World Cup draw
item.description: President Trump, along with Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum and Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney participated in the FIFA Men's World Cup draw ...

item.title: WATCH: Coldest temperatures of the season hit Midwest, Northeast

item.title: WATCH: Netflix set to buy Warner Bros. in deal valued at $83 billion
item.description: Netflix has announced it has entered a "definitive agreement" to acquire Warner Bros., including its film and television studios, HBO Max and HBO.

item.title: Shops empty in a Hispanic neighborhood as immigration crackdown comes to Louisiana
item.description: Federal border agents have descended on a Hispanic enclave just outside New Orleans and local business owners are suffering.

item.title: Pipe bomb suspect was 'disappointed' in 2020 election results, US attorney says

item.title: Man accused of planting pipe bombs before Jan. 6 Capitol attack is charged with explosives offenses
Immigration crackdown in New Orleans has a target of 5,000 arrests. Is that possible?
